r.d: This program reformat and beautify PHP 4 and PHP 5 source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP 5 and has a command line tool.
r.n: Improved Filter NewLines release + Added support for tokens. + Added optional dependency on bz2 - Bug fix: You could use, now, colons to separate contents and/or tokens * Example of use with command line: php_beautifier --filters "NewLines(before=if:switch:T_CLASS,after=T_COMMENT:function) ! Know issue: the comments have special rules for spacing. So, newlines before a token after a comment won't be created. Feature or Bug? You decide
